course_description: This is an introductory course on financial technology (FinTech). The course exposes BBA students to the basics, implementation, and use cases of FinTech in financial intermediation (e.g., banking, credit, payments). The topics include big data, automation, machine learning, P2P lending, crowdfunding, blockchain, cryptocurrencies, and ICOs. The course is delivered through interactive lecturettes, in-class activities, and group projects. The course is most relevant for consulting, investment banking, private equity, entrepreneurship, and corporate finance roles.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
